title:
Ready for Aaptiv‚Äôs first in-app group fitness experience? We‚Äôre so excited to introduce...Team Challenges!
Each season, we‚Äôll release a new themed challenge to all members, and we're kicking off with Summer Bootcamp! Sign up for an upcoming challenge through the Team Tab, and once each challenge begins, all participants will be assigned into smaller groups. And, for an extra boost of motivation and a little friendly competition, each group will then be broken into two teams. Complete the assigned workouts, earn points for your team, and the team with the most points at the end of the challenge wins! Each group will have a feed (similar to the team tab) where they can post messages, trade encouragement, and keep each other accountable. And the very best part? It's included in your Aaptiv membership (AKA no additional cost üôå) 
Team Challenges officially kick off every Monday throughout the ‚Äúseason‚Äù so if you‚Äôre not ready to commit during the first week, you can join the following week. 
This will be rolled out over the next week or so, so keep an eye out for it!
